'''''Minecraft: The Manga'' Volume 11''' is the eleventh {{W|tankōbon}} volume of the ''[[Minecraft: The Manga]]'' series.

== Chapters ==
*51. Save the Gluttonous Star! (食いしんぼうスタを救え!!, ''Kuishinbō Suta o Sukue!!'')
*52. Whirlpools are Approaching! Ease the Wrath of the Sea King!! (せまるうずしお! 海王の怒りをとけ!!, ''Semaru Uzu Shi o! Kaiō no Ikari o Toke!!'')
*53. A Fiery Flash! Deliver, The Feelings of Your Friends!! (熱き一閃! 届け、友の想い!!, ''Atsuki Issen! Todoke, Tomo no Omoi!!''
*54. Tranformable!? The Formidable Breeze Appears!! (変幻自在!? 強敵ブリーズ出現!!, ''Hengen Jizai!? Kyōteki Burīzu Shutsugen!!'')
*55. Nico Explodes! Defeat the Big Blast Scoundrel!! (ニコ爆走! 大爆発野郎をたおせ!!, ''Niko Bakusō! Dai Kuhatsu Yarō o Taose!!'')
*Special Edition: (Celebration) Minecraft 15th Anniversary Manga ((祝) マイクラ15周年記念マンガ, ''(Iwai) Maikura 15 Shūnen Kinen Manga'')
